game

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Game

  • public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
    The game file which control all the game flow. i.e. Controller in the MVC arcthitecture model
    Author:
    Dmitry kryukov, Ksenia Popova
    See Also:
    DiceEnum, CardsEnum, GamePhase, Continent, Country, Player, Neighbour, DicePanel, MapPanel, RightStatusPanel, TopStatusPanel

      • Game

        public Game(int RADIUS,
            java.util.List<Country> countries,
            java.util.List<Neighbour> neighbours,
            java.util.List<Player> players,
            java.util.List<Continent> continents)
        The constructor of the class. Genrates the instance of the main object (game) with the game flow.
        Parameters:
        RADIUS - radius of the default nodes
        countries - List of countries
        neighbours - List of connections
        players - List of players
        continents - List of continents
